title:
Universal inequalities for eigenvalues of the Dirichlet Laplacian on
  conformally flat Riemannian manifolds
abstract:
In this paper we study eigenvalues of the Dirichlet Laplacian on conformally
flat Riemannian manifolds. In particular we establish some universal inequality
for eigenvalues of the Dirichlet Laplacian on the hyperbolic space
$\mathbb{H}^n(-1)$.
